logical_rules.name: modus_ponens
logical_rules.description: If A implies B, and A is true, then B is true

logical_rules.name: modus_tollens
logical_rules.description: If A implies B, and B is false, then A is false

logical_rules.name: disjunctive_syllogism
logical_rules.description: If (A or B) is true, and A is false, then B is true

mathematical_rules.name: transitivity
mathematical_rules.description: If A = B and B = C, then A = C
